alert.note: Alert for Butler; Chase; Harper; Harvey; Kingman; Marion; Sedgwick; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 10:53PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Sedgwick, southeastern Harvey, Chase, northwestern Butler, Harper, southeastern Kingman, southeastern Marion and northwestern Sumner Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1053 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles east of Durham to 5 miles north of Halstead to 6 miles south of Kingman. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Andover, Haysville, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Goddard, Maize, Clearwater, Anthony, Harper, Towanda, Colwich, Conway Springs, Cottonwood Falls, Benton, Garden Plain, Whitewater, and Attica. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 25. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 34 and 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Butler; Chase; Harper; Harvey; Kingman; Marion; Sedgwick; Sumner
